BlackFortress/Hydras/darkHawk/Nightlight/Perceptor:

the BlackFortress's li=
ghts turn off and on while the alarms started to rang; hdyras opened his co=
mlink and said "Cyclonus, byall the pits what's goin on?" then shot against=
 Nightshift again. DarkHawk and Perceptor arrived to  the Throne Room and t=
hey enter; Darkhawk had dificulty to aim due that the light turns on and of=
f but he opened fire; Perceptor in other hand, jsut aimed and shoot against=
 the maximal signature.

Hydras send a secret comlink to Rodimus "Go to res=
each area and protect the Lady, if things goes wrong take her to the old Pr=
edacon base. Mask your signatures in order avoid the capture"

Nightlight w=
as iniside the Panic Room and she was full of fear.



From: Sandy 
Sent: S=
aturday, April 10, 2010 10:50 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: B=
lackFortress


  
Location: Black Fortress.

Nightshift, Tucson Prime, Rat =
Trap and Quickstride.

Inside the fortress:

Night Shift is almost caught b=
y surprise by his own shiruken and manages to swerve around it, with a scre=
ech in his tires. He was hoping to get one of the enemies to shoot at him,t=
hinking that by mistake they may just blast one of the control pannels that=
 controls the fortress accidentally, thus allowing him to slip out. With hi=
s night vision he spots a main control pannel, and realizes that Scorponok =
is shooting at him with the plasma cannons, as is Scourge, who is content o=
n trying to fry his carborator. He remains quiet, yet continues to speed ar=
ound the room, hoping that at least one of them would take the bait. He was=
n't running scared, he was clearly up to something strategic. He thinks to =
himself.

" I knew you bozos were stupid enough ta buy inta me. That's it, =
keep shootn' my way, eventually I'm gonna make a move toward one of them po=
wer boxes and then whoops, someone's gonna hit somethn' by accident."

He s=
ends a silent com to Lord Elder.

" Nightshift reportn' in Sir. I'm fine, j=
ust gettn' the chase of a lifetime in here, nothn' serious. I got a few din=
gs on the fenders but nothn' that can't be banged out with a hammer. Look, =
guys, I ain't found Nightlight, Rodimus or Windlord, but I'm kinda playn' a=
 game of catn' mouse with the baddies. Hopn' ta get one of them ta mess up'=
n hit a power box by accident, instead of hittn' me... OHHHH SCRAP!"

He sc=
reeches loudly as he avoids another close call with a plasma blast.

"That =
was almost my left front tire, close one. Anyway, I really could use a hand=
 in here, I dunno how much longer my fuel reserves are gonna hold out. I'm =
at about a half a tank now, and the way I'm gon' here, that ain't gonna tak=
e long ta go through... Gotta burn rubber, talk later, Nightshift out."

Ou=
tside the fortress, Tucson Prime comes out of his trance. He holds his ches=
t for just a moment.

"Sorry guys, I didn't mean to frighten you. I just go=
t quite the wakeup call. We need to get into that fortress but first we nee=
d to short out the control pannel that keeps it beneath that magma pool."

=
Rat Trap shrugs. 

"Lord Elder did mention somethn' about blastn' inta the =
pool, but we ain't got that kinda fire power on us."

Tuscon grins confiden=
tly.

"That's all right, I do. Stand back, the first step to bringing light=
 to a black flame, is to create a backdraft. On second thought, I better do=
 this in vehicle mode. I can assure your saftey better than being in robot =
mode."

He transforms into his missile truck mode, and opens his doors to h=
is cab.

"Lord Elder, I'm back, just needed to consult someone as to my nex=
t move. It's my first day on the job as a Prime and I needed a little insid=
e advice. And I got it. Kup, I also read you, and I'm going to expidite thi=
s mission a bit. It's dragged on far too long. Time for action not beating =
around the rotary."

He lines himself up for the shot and aims both missile=
 carriers at the pool, targeting not in the center of the pool, but a sligh=
t before getting to the middle of the magma chamber. Rat Trap and Quickstri=
de buckle in, to anticipate the major kick back Tucson's missile launchers =
may have. Then, Tucson fires, as they kick back, causing him to lurch backw=
ard slightly as he gets used to firing them at the same time.

"Ughh, felt =
that.. Are you two okay?"

Rat Trap is now on top of Quickstride, who is no=
w looking to the control pannel.

"Umm, we're - okay.. Just a little - bit =
shell shocked. Wowwww... Talk about kick back... It wasn't like ya didn't w=
arn us because ya did but we weren't expecting that..."

Rat Trap rubs his =
head.

"Yeah, talk about the big bang theory."

Tucson rolls forward just a=
 slight.

" It even kicked me back a few feet. I have to learn to ground my=
 tires when I use those missiles. Sorry about that."

Rat Trap gets back in=
to his seat and buckles up.

"So, how are we gonna get through this?

Tucso=
n parks himself safely waiting for the results of his launch.

" We're goin=
g to relight the dark flame. I have the power within me, the power of the M=
atrix. The dark flame, represents Rodimus, who's armor is black as pitch an=
d flaming paint job dimmed to a drap pale color. That's the fire I need to =
rekindle."

Rat Trap gasps as does Quickstride.

"But Wheels, that might th=
at might do a number on ya."

Tuscon sighs.

" I know Rat Trap, it will. I'=
ll still be a Prime no matter what happens, but if all goes well, we will g=
et Rodimus back and Cyclonus will pay for his deeds against Primus. It's wo=
rth the risk my friends, it's worth the risk."

Rat Trap sheds a tear.

"Bu=
t but what if it kills ya? What's Talon gonna do without ya? What am I gonn=
a do without ya? Wheels, you're the only real friend I ever did have. I don=
't wanna lose ya."

Tucson could feel a tear drip on his dashboard. 

" I p=
romise you Rat Trap, neither Talon or you is going to lose me that easilly.=
 I may be out of commission for a few days, but it's not going to kill me. =
Remember when we talked about the most powerful force in the universe? How =
nothing could ever surpass that?"

Rat Trap nodds.

" I think so. Ya told m=
e that love is a force no one can reckon with. Nothing breaks the bond of f=
riendship no matter how powerful evil becomes. Love knows no boundaries and=
 is the only infinite force that keeps on living even when one has passed o=
n long ago."

Tucson gently straps Rat Trap in more securely.

"That's righ=
t Rat Trap. Remember that. It's our bond as friends that can never be broke=
n. All of us, including Talon, Elita, Kup, Lord Elder, Depthcharge, Lord Pe=
rseus, Legacy, Guardia, and Ravenchief have the power within ourselves not =
because of tyranical strength, but because of that one thing that neither H=
ydras, Megatron or Galvatron ever had. And that was True Love. They rule wi=
th force, not with compassion. Our heart is what is going to win us this ba=
ttle, our hearts are going to come together as one and we will save those t=
hat need to be saved, and rekindle the lights that have nearly been blown o=
ut."

He starts up his engines.

" NOW, LET'S DO THIS! FOR RODIMUS PRIME!"
=

Rat Trap and Quickstride join in.

"FOR RODIMUS PRIME, LEADER OF THE AUTOB=
OTS!"

Tucson fires several more rounds into the magma.

ift, perhaps if we overcharge the Blackfortress circuits we can araise it, =

 link to Nightshift and said "Nightshift do you copy?"

n Carroll

s.com

The Ark - Command center
> 
> > "We will be risking as well Rodimus, Windlo=
rd and Nightlight "Said Kup by comlink"If only we know where are they... is=
 the only way to araise the blackFortress?"
> 
> Elder nodded sadly as he r=
eceived the transmission, "You're right, it
> might hurt the folks we're tr=
ying to rescue." He sighed slightly as he
> continued, "By training I am a =
guardian and sentinel, not the soldiers
> and tactical specialists that you=
 are."
> 
> He shrugged, clearly at a loss as to how to help, "Perhaps you =
can
> find a way to dig? It's a lot of heat down there though, I don't know=
.
> Kup you have been in a lot of battle, clearly more than I have, don't
>=
 you have any ideas?"
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
